doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 11 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 187[Air Date: 3/12/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 11 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 187[Air Date: 3/12/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. National Gay Rights Advocates, Bowers versus Hardwick in United States Supreme Court2. Two openly gay candidates run for office in Dane County, Wisconsin3. Megatone Records manager pleads guilty to embezzling fourteen thousand dollars from Gay Men's Health crisis proceeds4. Austin, Texas Klu Klux Klan member lashes out against homosexualsCOMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation5. Boston College anti-gay discrimination6. Jack Campbell runs for Florida United States SenateCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp7. Cambridge University treats AIDS patients with HTLVIII antibody blood8. Two labs develop possible HTLVIII vaccine advances9. Report examines HTLVIII credibility10. Pennsylvania bill proposes HTLVIII positive marriage banCOMMERCIAL: Commodore Plus 411. Sports, includes clips12. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Doris Traussig, GMHC volunteer, discusses what she does and why she volunteers13. screening of "A Chance of a Lifetime" at Hunter College14. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. This Week in Gay History with Jeff Bixby, includes clipCOMMERCIAL: CASIO Pocket TV3. Cable Car Awards coverageCOMMERCIAL: NGTF Fund for Human Dignity with Mike Farrell4. Sybil Bruncheon's birthday partyCOMMERCIAL: The Monster5. Current events/media/culture
